channel.title: Setting up VPS
channel.description:
Hello this is Your Master, today im going to make a tutorial how setup and VPS.
Difficulty: It's not that hard, so I would say 2/10
Description: Alot of people have been posting this, so finally i decided to make tutorial.
Tutorial:
Ok the first is, going to start [IMG]http://i619.photobucket.com/albums/tt277/Your-Death/tut1.jpg[/img]
Then go to Accessories and press on Remote Desktop Connection. Mine is Danish, not English. [IMG]http://i619.photobucket.com/albums/tt277/Your-Death/tut2.jpg[/img]
Now type in the VPS Username & Password that you will get in your email inbox/junk/spam
Now when you typed the IP then do not connect, go to options then press on Experience and do like in the picture. [IMG]http://i619.photobucket.com/albums/tt277/Your-Death/tut4.jpg[/img] When you did all the things above, you can connect. When you press connect, a little pop-up box will come and will look like this. [IMG]http://i619.photobucket.com/albums/tt277/Your-Death/tut5.jpg[/img] Write in your username and pass, then connect and whola you got your VPS. If you dont understand this or having problems, then there is an video how to do it at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d7-oadqBRzM
Credits: 95% Me for making this tutorial and all that shit etc. 5% For The Soul, for his picture in the command promt picture :)
If I spelled something wrong, please feel free to post it.
Best/Regards, Your Master
NOTE: Here is my permission to post this: [IMG]http://i619.photobucket.com/albums/tt277/Your-Death/tut7.jpg[/img]

item.title: Setting up VPS
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

[quote=“pkpoison, post:3, topic:327475”][quote author=relmitos link=topic=423863.msg3112834#msg3112834 date=1264697384]
Why would I want to connect to my own desktop through remote desktop…
[/quote]

If you actually read the tutorial you would know that you’re connecting to the vps.[/quote]

I did. Did you? Doesnt seem like it.

Now type in your local-ipadress. It can be found when you go in Start>Run or Start>CMD typing ipconfig and like this should pop-up, type that

And then what?

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up VPS
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Hello this is Your Master, today im going to make a tutorial how setup and VPS.

Difficulty: It’s not that hard, so I would say 2/10

Description: Alot of people have been posting this, so finally i decided to make tutorial.

Tutorial:

Ok the first is, going to start

Then go to Accessories and press on Remote Desktop Connection. Mine is Danish, not English.

tut2.jpg380×724

Now type in the VPS Username & Password that you will get in your email inbox/junk/spam

Now when you typed the IP then do not connect, go to options then press on Experience and do like in the picture.
When you did all the things above, you can connect. When you press connect, a little pop-up box will come and will look like this. Write in your username and pass, then connect and whola you got your VPS.
If you dont understand this or having problems, then there is an video how to do it at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d7-oadqBRzM

Credits:
95% Me for making this tutorial and all that shit etc.
5% For The Soul, for his picture in the command promt picture

If I spelled something wrong, please feel free to post it.

Best/Regards,
Your Master

NOTE: Here is my permission to post this:

tut7.jpg819×301

Read full topic
